name: Tax Deduction Comparison Report (Old vs New)
query:
SELECT 
    e.name AS `Employee ID`,
    e.employee_name AS `Employee Name`,
    e.custom_tax_regime_preference AS `Tax Regime`,
    SUM(CASE WHEN ss.salary_structure = 'Old Regime' THEN ss.total_deduction ELSE 0 END) AS `Old Regime Tax`,
    SUM(CASE WHEN ss.salary_structure = 'New Regime' THEN ss.total_deduction ELSE 0 END) AS  `New Regime Tax`
FROM `tabSalary Slip` ss
JOIN `tabEmployee` e ON ss.employee = e.name
GROUP BY e.name, e.employee_name, e.custom_tax_regime_preference;
report_name: Tax Deduction Comparison Report (Old vs New)
